document.full_text: an egyptian court convicted former finance minister youssef boutros-ghali in absentia on saturday and sentenced him to 30 years in prison for profiteering and abusing state and private assets, a court source said.
document.title: egypt court sentences former finance minister to 30 years jail
lines_and_colors: an egyptian court convicted former finance minister youssef boutros-ghali in absentia on saturday and sentenced him to 30 years in prison for profiteering and abusing state and private assets, a court source said.
